ygData.subject: Re: A good idea, Dark Elves especially please read.
ygData.msgSnippet: I was thinking a quest which you could not do UNTIL level 40 or 45 (anyone actually know what level a dragoon is?) I even have my battle macro ready for level
ygData.messageBody:
I was thinking a quest which you could not do UNTIL level 40 or 45 (anyone
actually know what level a dragoon is?)

I even have my battle macro ready for level 40 :)

"Face the skilled fury of a Neriak Dragoon!"

Dragoon Jaade D'Vinn (one day anyway).

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 11:40 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] A good idea, Dark Elves especially please
> read.
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> Good idea.....Dragoon Salr D'Taynkk.....I like the sound of that :)
>
> but there should be a quest associated with it, like the paladins, not
> just acheiving a certain level.
>
> >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.24.99 9:18:52 PM >>>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> I saw a good idea posted on the eqvault board regarding Paladins who do
> the
> knight of truth quest getting a sir added to there name. I typed feedback
> for this, since I think its a good idea.
>
> It then occurred to me, why cant Dark Elf warriors get a similar title.
> Why
> cant we get Dragoon added to our names when we hit level 45 (or whatever
> level the Dragoons are). Either get it automatically, IF we want it or
> perform a quest to get it.
>
> I already wrote feedback on this, if anyone else thinks its a good idea,
> could I ask you all to write some feed back :) ?
>
> thanks.
>
